name: abundance (itch)
description:
A lone survivor hides in a warehouse as a plague spreads amidst a supposed plant growth revolution. Now, a few days after the worst has passed, what kind of world is out there?

Explore the world in this 2.5D metroidvania platformer. Can you find all 14 log entries and unravel the plot?

controls
  • arrows (or WASD) to move
  • X to jump
  • C to use knife
  • Z to interact
  • P to open PDA to read logs etc
  • U to toggle fullscreen (also available from the PDA)
